S

ScrabbleApplication - Class in com.bluenile.scrabble
 
ScrabbleApplication() - Constructor for class com.bluenile.scrabble.ScrabbleApplication
 
ScrabbleController - Class in com.bluenile.scrabble.api
This controller class is responsible for exposing the API methods for clients, this class is a RESTful web service to receive the request as a GET method then takes the input string parameter and creates a list of words based on the characters contained in the input string.
ScrabbleController(ScrabbleService) - Constructor for class com.bluenile.scrabble.api.ScrabbleController
Creates a scrableController and sets the scrableService property, so that the controller can delegate the Scrabble process to service.
ScrabbleDao - Interface in com.bluenile.scrabble.dao
Interface defined to declare the behaviors for manipulating information from a data source such as database, file system or any other data storage.
ScrabbleDaoText - Class in com.bluenile.scrabble.dao
Class that implements ScrabbleDao interface to define its own data access, responsible to read the list of words from a text file and generate a List of ScrabbleWord objects.
ScrabbleDaoText() - Constructor for class com.bluenile.scrabble.dao.ScrabbleDaoText
 
ScrabbleService - Class in com.bluenile.scrabble.service
 
ScrabbleService(ScrabbleDao) - Constructor for class com.bluenile.scrabble.service.ScrabbleService
 
ScrabbleWord - Class in com.bluenile.scrabble.model
Model Class for manipulating any word that comes from the data source.
ScrabbleWord(String, int) - Constructor for class com.bluenile.scrabble.model.ScrabbleWord
Creates a scrabbleWord object composed by the word and its related score.
